abstract: Lawyers for John Edwards say they will ask federal judge to dismiss charges that he violated campaign finance laws by using nearly $1 million from two wealthy benefactors to support his pregnant mistress during his run for the presidency in 2008.
snippet: Lawyers for John Edwards say federal prosecutors went too far in charging him with using campaign donations to support his mistress in 2008.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for John Edwards say federal prosecutors went too far in charging him with using campaign donations to support his mistress in 2008.

headline.seo: John Edwards Fights Campaign Finance Case
